resources.string:
Currency Abbreviations - 

USD - United States Dollar 
EUR - Euro 
JPY - Japanese Yen 
GBP - British Pounds 
CHF - Swiss Franc 
CAD - Canadian Dollar 
AUD - Australian Dollar 
INR - Indian Rupees 
CNY - Chinese Yuan 
AED - United Arab Emirates Dirham 
SGD - Singapore Dollar 
RUB - Russian Ruble
